site_name: West Hendon Estate West HendonLondonNW9
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference 23/1802/FUL dated 19/08/24 for 'Comprehensive redevelopment of the site comprising the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the construction of 8 buildings from 2 to 12 storeys comprising of 350 residential units (Use Class C3), commercial uses (Use Class E), including Health Centre, basement, private and communal amenity space, associated car parking, cycle parking, refuse storage.' Amendments include: Risers sizes adjusted; Minor amendments to landscape; Balcony internal depths now max. 1575mm; Building footprint adjusted; Party walls changed from 250mm to 300mm between apartments; Cycle storage distribution rationalised; Core layouts amended; Ventilated lobbies to bin stores removed from car park; Technical areas revised and amended where needed; Lift shaft arrangement changed in block; increase from 63 to 66 covered parking spaces; Substation and main electrical switchroom alterations; Risers arrangement adjusted; Relocated cleaners cupboard; Addition of vents and grills for smoke extract and ventilation; Removal of parcel boxes and rationalisation of post box locations in main entrance lobbies; Amendment in external brickwork details; Alterations to block C1 amenity spaces; Concrete canopy at top of stairs removed; Unit layouts amended; Balcony positions revised; Double height area in entrance lobby extended; Adjusted balcony positions; Removal of AOVs at the end of the corridors blocks C1 and C3 and adjustments of associated apartments; Removal of metal panels to balconies; Replacement of concrete panel cladding with brick at base of C4; Adjusted roof levels; Parapets heights adjusted to 1150mm above roof finishes;
